column5: A quiet, well equipped one story home in an established North Arlington neighborhood. Less than two miles from the Cowboy's AT&T stadium, the Ranger's Globe Life Park and Six Flags over Texas and less than a mile from Six Flags Hurricane Harbor. A nice variety of restaurants and shops are equally close by and DFW International Airport is only 11 miles away. You will be in the center of the DFW Metroplex with easy access to both Fort Worth and Dallas.
